meanings.sent1: The actress had a zaftig body that stood out in a crowd.
meanings.sent2: She felt confident and beautiful in her zaftig curves.
meanings.sent3: Despite her zaftig shape, she was a graceful dancer.
meanings.sent4: Her zaftig silhouette filled the room with warmth and charm.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the zaftig beauty of the model perfectly.

meanings.definition: (noun) a woman with a full, rounded figure
meanings.sent1: The magazine featured a zaftig on its cover, celebrating body positivity.
meanings.sent2: She embraced her identity as a proud zaftig in the fashion industry.
meanings.sent3: The comedy show included a hilarious character who was a zaftig.
meanings.sent4: In the play, the lead actress portrayed a confident zaftig with grace.
meanings.sent5: The artist's sculpture captured the essence of a zaftig in all its beauty.
